claim: A Monster Calls was directed by J. A. Bayona in 2002.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The song was released as a one-off single to feature on the soundtrack of the 2016 fantasy film A Monster Calls , directed by J. A. Bayona  (  Keane worked with Bayona on the video for their 2012 single `` Disconnected ''  )  .

claim: A Monster Calls was directed by J. A. Bayona in 2002.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A Monster Calls is a 2016 dark fantasy drama film directed by J. A. Bayona and written by Patrick Ness , based on his novel of the same name .

claim: A Monster Calls was directed by J. A. Bayona in 2002.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A film adaptation , directed by J. A. Bayona and written for the screen by Ness himself , was released in 2016 .
